record.title: HONORING THE UNIVERSITY OF HAWAII
record.narrative:
HONORING THE UNIVERSITY OF HAWAII -- (Senate - December 17, 2007)

[Page: S15791]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Judiciary Committee be discharged from further consideration of H. Con. Res. 264, and that the Senate then proceed to its immediate consideration.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will report the concurrent resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 264) honoring the University of Hawaii for its 100 years of commitment to public higher education.
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the concurrent resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the concurrent resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motions to reconsider be laid upon the table; that any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 264) was agreed to.
